Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
cooldown=4 power=60 rate=1/30
local debris=game:GetService("Debris") equipped=false check=true
function waitfor(a,b) while a:FindFirstChild(b)==nil do wait() end return a:FindFirstChild(b) end lastuse=waitfor(sp,"LastUse")
function onEquipped(mouse) equipped=true if mouse~=nil then sp.Handle.Transparency=1 if tick()-cooldown<lastuse.Value then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(lastuse.Value-(tick()-cooldown)) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end sp.Handle.Transparency=0 mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() local hu=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local t=sp.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") if check and hu and hu.Health>0 and t then check=false mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" local sound=sp.Handle:FindFirstChild("ThrowSound") if sound~=nil then sound:Play() end local shoulder=t:FindFirstChild("Right Shoulder") if shoulder~=nil then shoulder.CurrentAngle=math.pi end local p=sp.Handle:clone() p.Name="Effect" p.CanCollide=true p.Transparency=0
local vec=(mouse.Hit.p-t.Position).unit p.CFrame=CFrame.new(t.Position,t.Position+vec)*CFrame.new(0,0,-5) p.Velocity=(vec*power)+Vector3.new(0,20,0) p.RotVelocity=((Vector3.new(1,1,1)*math.random())-Vector3.new(.5,.5,.5))*20
local c=Instance.new("ObjectValue") c.Name="creator" c.Value=game.Players.LocalPlayer c.Parent=p
local s=script.Script:clone() s.Parent=p s.Disabled=false debris:AddItem(p,10) p.Parent=game.Workspace
sp.Handle.Transparency=1 lastuse.Value=tick() wait(cooldown) sp.Handle.Transparency=0 if mouse~=nil then mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end check=true end end) end end
function onUnequipped() equipped=false end
sp.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) sp.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

--Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
wait(2.5)
shrapnelvelocity=100 shrapnelcount=math.random(12,14)
meshes={{36869983,36869975},{36780113,36780292},{36780032,36780292},{36780156,36780292},{36780079,36780292},{36780195,36780292}}
local creator=sp:FindFirstChild("creator") local debris=game:GetService("Debris")
function createshrapnel(pos) local p=Instance.new("Part") p.Name="Effect" p.Material="Wood" p.formFactor="Custom" p.CanCollide=true p.Anchored=false p.TopSurface="Smooth" p.BottomSurface="Smooth" p.Size=Vector3.new(1,2,1) local s=script:FindFirstChild("Script") if s~=nil then local sc=s:clone() sc.Parent=p sc.Disabled=false end local m=Instance.new("SpecialMesh") local rm=meshes[math.random(1,#meshes)] m.MeshId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..tostring(rm[1]) m.TextureId="http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id="..tostring(rm[2]) m.Parent=p if creator~=nil then creator:clone().Parent=p end debris:AddItem(p,2.5+math.random()) p.CFrame=(CFrame.new(pos)+(Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()*.5,math.random()-.5)*5))*CFrame.Angles(math.random()*math.pi*2,math.random()*math.pi*2,math.random()*math.pi*2) p.Velocity=(p.Position-pos).unit*(shrapnelvelocity*(.5+math.random())) p.RotVelocity=Vector3.new(math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5,math.random()-.5)*10 p.Parent=game.Workspace end
--[[local smoke=Instance.new("Smoke") smoke.Size=20 smoke.RiseVelocity=20 smoke.Color=Color3.new(0,.8,0) smoke.Parent=sp]]
local fire=Instance.new("Fire") fire.Heat=0 fire.Size=100 fire.Color=Color3.new(1,.9,.8) fire.SecondaryColor=Color3.new(.75,.25,0) fire.Parent=sp
local explodesound=sp:FindFirstChild("ExplodeSound") if explodesound then explodesound:Play() end sp.Anchored=true sp.Transparency=1 for i=1,shrapnelcount do createshrapnel(sp.Position) end wait(.3) sp:remove()

--Stickmasterluke
sp=script.Parent
damage=22
sp.Touched:connect(function(hit) if hit~=nil and hit.Parent~=nil then local creator=sp:FindFirstChild("creator") local h=hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local speed=sp.Velocity.magnitude if creator~=nil and h~=nil and h.Health>0 and speed>1 then local plr=game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(h.Parent) if plr~=nil and creator.Value~=nil then if creator.Value==plr then return end end for i,v in ipairs(h:GetChildren()) do if v.Name=="creator" then v:remove() end end creator:clone().Parent=h local percent=math.min(speed/60,1) print(damage*percent) h:TakeDamage(damage*percent) end end end)
wait(10)
sp:remove()
